result.eng: The house is at the top of the hill.
result.ga: Tá an teach ag barr an chnoic
result.orig: Tá an teach ag barr an chnoic
result.html: Tá an teach ag barr an chnoicThe house is at the top of the hill.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ ag barr an ċnoicThe house is at the top of the hill.

result.eng: What is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ga: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.orig: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.html: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaighWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leaṫanaiġWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?

result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.orig: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.html: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seomra beag in uaċtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.

result.eng: I managed to reach the top.
result.ga: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amachI managed to reach the top.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ liom an barr a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach the top.

result.html: Faoi rún daingeanTop secret!
result.ponchtml: Faoi rún daingeanTop secret!

result.eng: I failed to reach the top.
result.ga: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.orig: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.html: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amachI failed to reach the top.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeip orm an barr a ḃaint amaċI failed to reach the top.

result.eng: We are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibheWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid tréigṫe anseo ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.

result.eng: They poured the soapy water on top of him.
result.ga: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas air
result.orig: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas air
result.html: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas airThey poured the soapy water on top of him.
result.ponchtml: Doirteaḋ an t-uisce sobalaċ anuas airThey poured the soapy water on top of him.

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ga: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.orig: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.html: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar ḃarr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.

result.eng: At the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ga: I mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.orig: I mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.html: I mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh síAt the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ponchtml: I mbarr a guṫa ġlaoiġ síAt the top of her voice, she called:...
